Una bici elettrica ideale per andare al: An electric bike ideal for going to work or enjoying the characteristic country lanes.
Telaio step-thru leggero in alluminio/Tr: Lightweight aluminum step-thru frame / Shimano Deore 10-speed drivetrain / Hydraulic disc brakes. Quality lights, fenders, rear rack / Cane Creek suspension seatpost / Garmin rear radar. Bosch Performance Line Cruise / 625 Wh battery / Range: up to 160 km.
